predicate.note: Frames file for 'hoist' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment.

example.name: hoist by your own petard
example.text: A huge ANC flag, with black, green and gold stripes, was hoisted [*-1] over the rickety gate at Mr. Sisulu's modest house, while on the street out front, boys displayed the ANC colors on their shirts, caps and scarves.
example.arg: [*-1] -> A huge ANC flag, with black, green and gold stripes,
the rickety gate at Mr. Sisulu's modest house
while on the street out front, boys displayed the ANC colors on their shirts, caps and scarves
